#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Gotemba
#Text=Gotemba ( 御殿場 ) , occasionally written Gotenba , is a city in
#Text=Shizuoka , Japan .
#Text=One of the starting points for the climb up Mount Fuji , Gotemba also offers premium outlet shopping .
#Text=By plane
#Text=There are direct buses to Gotemba Station from Haneda Airport operated by Odakyu Hakone Highway Bus and Keikyu Bus every 2 hours during the day ( 2 hrs , ¥ 2060 ) .
#Text=Service between Narita Airport and Gotemba is very limited .
#Text=There are only two return services per day to the Gotemba stop on the Tomei Expressway ( 3 hrs , ¥ 4100 ) .
#Text=It might be best to travel from Narita to Tokyo , then head to Gotemba from there by train or by bus .
#Text=By train
#Text=Gotemba Station is located on the JR Gotemba Line , which branches inland from the Tokaido Main Line at Numazu at the western end and Kōzu at the eastern end .
#Text=From Tokyo
#Text=Odakyu Railway offers a few daily limited express Romancecar services to Gotemba Station from their terminal in Shinjuku .
#Text=These services are called the Fujisan ( ふじさん ) because of Gotemba 's proximity to Mount Fuji .
#Text=There are three round-trips on weekdays , and five round-trips on weekends and holidays .
#Text=Trips take two hours and cost ¥ 2810 .
#Text=Seat reservations are compulsory .
#Text=If you hold the Japan Rail Pass , you 'll have to pay the Odakyu Railway basic and Romancecar fares ( ¥ 1470 ) .

#Text=The alternate way to reach Gotemba by train - and the option that does n't cost anything with a Japan Rail Pass - is to take a Tokaido Main Line service to Kōzu and change to the JR Gotemba Line .
#Text=With this method it takes around 2 hrs 15 min from Tokyo Station and costs ¥ 1940 .
#Text=From Central/Western Japan
#Text=From cities to the west ( Nagoya , Kyoto , etc. ) , take the Tokaido Shinkansen to Mishima .
#Text=From there , take the Tokaido Line local train to Numazu , then the Gotemba Line to Gotemba .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Odakyu Hakone Highway Bus runs services from Shinjuku Expressway Bus Terminal ( Busta Shinjuku ) to Gotemba Station , with 1-2 buses every hour .
#Text=The trip takes 1 hr 45 min and costs ¥ 1680 .
#Text=Odakyu and JR Bus also run less frequent services from Tokyo Station ( 1 hr 30 min , ¥ 1650 ) .
#Text=Buses also run to Gotemba Station from Haneda Airport ( about 2 hr , ¥ 2060 ) and Yokohama Station ( 80 min , ¥ 1650 ) several times during the day .

#Text=A few Odakyu buses from Shinjuku run directly to the Gotemba Premium Outlets , with two trips to the outlets in the morning and three trips back to Shinjuku in the evening ( 1 hr 45 min , ¥ 1800 ) .
#Text=Otherwise , free shuttle buses connect the train station with the premium outlets .
#Text=Other highway buses may use the Tomei Gotemba Interchange stop on the Tomei Expressway .
#Text=Taxis are available outside the interchange , but free shuttles operate during the day to both Gotemba train station and the Premium Outlets .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Free shuttle buses operate every 15 minutes during the day between Gotemba Station , Tomei Gotemba Interchange bus stop and the Premium Outlets .
#Text=The buses run during the operating hours of the Premium Outlets .
#Text=If you want to climb Mount Fuji from the Gotemba side , there are buses from Gotemba Station to the Gotemba 5th Station .
#Text=Buses take 40 min and cost ¥ 1110 one way or ¥ 1540 round-trip .
#Text=Otherwise , walking is a good way to experience Gotemba 's quaintness , as well as find random views of Mount Fuji .
#Text=See
#Text=Gotemba Heiwa Koen ( Peace Park ) ( 御殿場平和公園 ) The Peace Park has a white stupa with golden Buddha statues as well as temple dogs donated from other Buddhist countries in Asia .
#Text=Prayers can still be heard at the temple on the grounds .
#Text=Also enjoy the walkway of Bodhisattva statues hidden in the woods .
#Text=During the spring , the area is covered in cherry blossoms .
#Text=Kogen Brewery （高原ビール）- Kogen Brewery is a large complex housing various restaurants as well as a Brush Up Hotel and hot springs .
#Text=During the winter months , there is a large illumination display as well as open stalls selling food .
#Text=There is also a bakery and food store , gift shops , and a flower shop in addition to a local fruit and vegetable market .
#Text=Shuttle buses run about once an hour with service to Gotemba Tomei Express and Gotemba station .
#Text=Buses are also available to Iwanami , Susono and Mishima stations .
#Text=The shuttle bus is free .
#Text=Mt .
#Text=Fuji Taiko Festival
#Text=A taiko ( drum ) festival held every August in Gotemba .
#Text=Features local performers as well as various competitions .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Gotemba Premium Outlets - Gotemba Premium Outlets offers brand names with a good variety of shops ( from Armani to Adidas ) .
#Text=A free shuttle bus runs everyone twenty minutes from 9am to closing hours from both Gotemba station and the Gotemba Tomei Express .
#Text=On busy days , it 's faster to walk there ( half an hour to forty-five minutes from the station ) .
#Text=Eat
#Text=" Little America " exists on 246 , with a McDonald 's , Baskin Robbins , KFC , and Denny 's all in a row .
#Text=Local family restaurants include Jonathan 's , Big Boy , Coco 's , and Yoshino .
#Text=Chain and local izakaya ( food and drink bars ) can be found around the station .
#Text=Meiten Kitchen and Bar Located a short walk from the station , this restaurant is a house converted into a small eatery .
#Text=They have an English menu as well as alcoholic drinks .
#Text=Food ranges from seasonal curry to pradatha to spaghetti and salad .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Gotenba is lacking in genuine bars but has a few chain izakayas .
#Text=Check out Dorifu for somewhat of a bar atmosphere .

#Text=Hibiki serves as a restaurant but very occasionally pulls out the stops for a good club event , with local and Tokyo DJs playing good electronic dance music and a crowd coming from neighboring towns .
#Text=Wednesday night at Majolica was ladies ' night , with reduced prices on drinks and no ladies .
#Text=Now closed - alas , still no ladies .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Gotemba Youth Hostel
#Text=3857 Higashiyama , Gotemba-shi , 412-0024 , Shizuoka-ken
#Text=The cheapest place in town .
#Text=Call for rates .
#Text=Connect
#Text=The Gotemba city website has a list of other sight seeing spots within the area .
#Text=For those living within Gotemba or staying for a longer period , it might be worth it to contact the Gotemba International Association .
#Text=GIA puts on various international and culture events in the city every year .
